dim.name: nSfcAreaWeightedAvgFields
dim.description: A number equal to or greater than the number of var arrays in the surfaceAreaWeightedAveragesAM var structure below.

dim.name: nOceanRegions
dim.description: The number of regions defined within the global ocean (will eventually be moved up and used uniformly across MPAS-O.

nml_option.name: config_AM_surfaceAreaWeightedAverages_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member surface_area_weighted_average is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_surfaceAreaWeightedAverages_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_surfaceAreaWeightedAverages_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_surfaceAreaWeightedAverages_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Time interval the determines how frequently the surface area weighted averages analysis member should be computed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_surfaceAreaWeightedAverages_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream the surface area weighted averages analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_surfaceAreaWeightedAverages_compute_predef_regions
nml_option.description: Computes predefined regions. (Does not require a region mask file.)

nml_option.name: config_AM_surfaceAreaWeightedAverages_region_group
nml_option.description: The name of the region group, for which surface area weighted averages should be computed in addition to the global version.
nml_option.possible_values: 'all', '', or the name of a region group.

package.name: surfaceAreaWeightedAveragesAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the areal-averaging of 2D variables that are defined, primarily, at the surface.

var.name: surfaceMask
var.description: Mask for Surface Area Weighted Averaging

var.name: minSurfaceMaskValue
var.description: Minimum value of region mask (should always be 1 for valid regions)

var.name: minSurfaceArea
var.description: Minimum area of a surface cell in each region

var.name: minLatentHeatFlux
var.description: Minimum latent heat flux in each region

var.name: minSensibleHeatFlux
var.description: Minimum sensible heat flux in each region

var.name: minLongWaveHeatFluxUp
var.description: Minimum upwelling long wave heat flux in each region

var.name: minLongWaveHeatFluxDown
var.description: Minimum downwelling long wave heat flux in each region

var.name: minSeaIceHeatFlux
var.description: Minimum sea ice heat flux in each region

var.name: minShortWaveHeatFlux
var.description: Minimum short wave heat flux in each region

var.name: minEvaporationFlux
var.description: Minimum evaporation in each region

var.name: minSeaIceFreshWaterFlux
var.description: Minimum sea ice melt rate in each region

var.name: minRiverRunoffFlux
var.description: Minimum river run off in each region

var.name: minIceRunoffFlux
var.description: Minimum ice run off in each region

var.name: minRainFlux
var.description: Minimum rain flux in each region

var.name: minSnowFlux
var.description: Minimum snow flux in each region

var.name: minSeaIceEnergy
var.description: Minimum sea ice energy in each region

var.name: minSurfaceThicknessFlux
var.description: Minimum surface thickness flux in each region

var.name: minSurfaceTemperatureFlux
var.description: Minimum surface temperature flux in each region

var.name: minSurfaceSalinityFlux
var.description: Minimum surface salinity flux in each region

var.description: Minimum sea ice salinity flux in each region

var.description: Minimum wind stress magnitude in each region

var.name: minWindStressZonal
var.description: Minimum zonal wind stress in each region

var.name: minWindStressMeridional
var.description: Minimum meridional wind stress in each region

var.description: Minimum sea surface pressure in each region

var.name: minSurfaceSSH
var.description: Minimum sea-surface height in each region
